content:
Three hundred, four hundred, six hundred, eight hundred, seven hundred...
Oh, I'm calculating my remaining savings,
After all, the living services contract is quite a substantial sum.
info: 幻雪关于还居业费的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Numbers are too difficult for me, but!
Overcoming challenges is an essential spirit for any researcher!
I've decided to start by calculating my living service contracts.
info: 幻雪关于还居业费的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
During my interpretation of last night's sky, I realized...
The life service contract isn't just a collection of numbers,
it's also a guide to living, with a touch of mystery~.
info: 幻雪关于还居业费的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
If I save 10 Dough per day,
In 100 days I'll save... 10,000 Dough?!
Hmm, perhaps a life services contract isn't that expensive after all.
info: 幻雪关于还居业费的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: Yeep~ Did I count to four hundred or eight hundred just now?
